name: @siegrift/tsfunct
author: Siegrift <e.tesarr@gmail.com>

scripts.build: yarn tsc --project . && cp package.json dist && cp README.md dist
scripts.docs: yarn clean && typedoc index.ts --out docs&& cp -r ./assets/* docs/assets

hooks.pre-commit: python3 check_exports.py && yarn test && yarn clean && yarn docs && git add docs/*

description: Tsfunct is a **T**ype**S**cript **funct**ional library made directly for TS with its static typesystem in mind.
